title: LEAKS Aren’t The Problem, Nun Pulls HUGE Scam 6.14.21
itunes:title: LEAKS Aren’t The Problem, Nun Pulls HUGE Scam 6.14.21
description:
In episode 929, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Chris Gethard to discuss Southern vaccination rates, how hunts for leaks are a danger to democracy, other billionaires wanting to go to space, a nun on the run, pop-culture cereal, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Here’s Who’s Facing a Nightmare ‘Vaxx Summer’
  2. Hunting leaks, Trump officials subpoenaed Apple for data of 2 Democrats in Congress
  3. If Donald Trump Targets Journalists, Thank Obama
  4. Billionaire Tax Leak Referred to FBI as Probe Grows, IRS Says
  5. Unconfirmed report suggests Branson may try to beat Bezos into space — and Virgin Galactic didn't deny it
  6. Despite her vow of poverty, nun stole more than $835,000 from a Catholic school, prosecutors said
  7. Lucky Charms Releases Limited-Edition 'Loki Charms' Cereal in Honor of Marvel Series — Here's How to Get a Box
  8. You Had One Job, Ghostbusters: Afterlife Cereal
  9. Things We Saw Today: Is This Baby Yoda Cereal the Stuff of Dreams or Nightmares?
  10. Son of a Nutcracker! General Mills Is Releasing Elf Cereal to Sweeten the Holiday Season
  11. Super Bowl: When Tie-In Novelty Cereals Ruled the 1980s
  12. Laura Stevenson – “State”
  13. CHRIS GETHARD: HALF MY LIFE
  14. LISTEN: Peggy Gou - Nabi (feat. OHHYUK)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
